title: Debt Tracker
description: A website that allows users to keep track of who owes them money and the current status of the debt with Flask login and authentication and CRUD functionality.

title: Payment System
description: A simple one product ecommerce website with a stripe payment system integrated.

title: To-Do List Application
description: A simple to-do list application that allows users to add, delete, and mark tasks as completed.

title: Personal Portfolio Website
description: A personal portfolio website built with Flask. It's the website you are currently one.

title: Fifa Ultimate Team Price tracker
description: I play alot of fifa ultimate team lately and since it uses a live market for players I created a price tracker that tracks the prices of players I am interested in and emails me with updates on when they are low or high.
